item.title: Chord Spelling Chart - Reference for Musicians
item.description: This music theory cheat sheet shows chord spellings for common chord types. The chart shows chord names, symbols, the interval formula and example labels and notes with C as the tonic. Knowing how these common chord types are built is helpful for unders

item.title: Major Scales Reference Chart for Musicians
item.description: This music theory cheat sheet shows the notes and major, minor and diminished diatonic triads for the 12 major scales in the order of circle of fifths: C, G, D, A, E, B, Gb, Db, Ab, Eb, Bb, F. Knowing the major scale and what diatonic chords go with it

item.title: Midi Note Numbers Reference Chart for Musicians
item.description: A MIDI controller can have up to 128 (8 bit) distinct pitches. This table shows them and the corresponding English musical note names in a concise chart for reference. This cheat sheet for musicians provides a handy means to quickly look up midi note numbe

item.title: Musical Note Names in 5 Languages Reference Chart
item.description: This table shows the names of the 7 natural notes and the 5 flats and sharps in English, French, German, Italian and Spanish. English uses the letters A to G, hence musical alphabet, German A to H and the 3 Roman languages use do re mi fa sol la si. This c
